skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the real estate one stop shop
Developer Terms of Use
des: The idea that began nearly three decades ago was to create a platform (just web-based at the time), where consumers could go to get information and services for everything they would ever need to buy, sell, finance, maintain, and even send referrals for all things real estate, in one single, convenient location (a website). Today, we've evolved with our commitment to provide the consumer with an easy to use, single go-to platform to programming all things real estate for the Voice User, as well. We have simplified the process of buying, selling, maintaining, financing, and referring real estate so you don't have to. Real estate has never been so easy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
